header.title: I TOTVS Agribusiness Hackathon
header.subtitle: 1st place using an IoT solution for meadow irrigation issues.

text: Realized in TOTVS agribusiness excellence center, the event was a space prone to creativity. In a non-interrupted idea development time of 30 hours, the 28 coding marathon selected participants (from a total of 128 from two different local universities) were separated and had the goal to present projects related to the theme: 'Innovation in multicultivation for grains, citrus and sugar cane'.

Using the Intel Edison embedded IoT hardware and web service technologies, our group developed a web-based report solution that enabled farmers to keep track of their field irrigation levels and take action upon those information. This solution granted us the first position on the hackathon and job offers in the company’s branch office in the city of Assis, in the state of São Paulo (Brazil).
Roles: Designer, front-end developer and task manager.
Tech stack: Photoshop, Powerpoint, Git, PHP, jQuery, CSS, Kanban.
